title: Extensions Manifest
description: Metadata and settings needed to present a ParaCharts element which are extensions to JIM. @public

settings.description: The settings needed to present a chart in ParaCharts.
The settings needed to present a chart in ParaCharts.

isSoniEnabled.description: Whether sonification is enabled for this chart. Defaults to true.

aspectRatio.description: The ratio of the height to the width of the chart on the screen (i.e. x-axis size / y-axis size). Defaults to 1 (i.e. a square chart).

minValue.description: The minimum value of the axis.

maxValue.description: The maximum value of the axis.

axisExtremeValue.description: Settings for an extreme of a particular Axis

number.$comment: `number` is necessary for `axisExtremeValue` to avoid TypeScript type inference errors.

constUnset.$comment: `constUnset` is necessary for `axisExtremeValue` to avoid TypeScript type inference errors.
